pageContext.claim: “In fact, I was criticized -- coming up, I was criticized that I didn't raise as much money as Hillary Clinton, that I only spent half. It's actually much less than half.”
pageContext.analysis: As of Dec. 2016, Trump raised roughly two thirds the amount that Clinton had raised — $957.6 million compared to Clinton's $1.4 billion. The Trump campaign spent 99 percent of what it had raised. The Clinton campaign spent 98 percent.
